Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.radio

Interface Radio

public interface Radio
Represents a radio button or group of radio buttons in a UI automation framework. Provides methods for selecting radio buttons by text, strategy, or locator, and offers checks for enabled, visible, or selected states. It also allows retrieval of the currently selected button or a complete list of available radio buttons.

Implementations typically rely on Selenium-based interactions using container references (SmartWebElement) or direct locators (By), enabling consistent handling of radio inputs throughout an application.

This interface is intended to be used wherever a radio group or individual radio elements need to be tested or manipulated, providing a standard contract for UI automation.

Author:

  • Method Details

    • select

      void select(SmartWebElement container, String radioButtonText)
      Selects a radio button, identified by its text, within the specified container.
      Parameters:
      container - the container holding the radio buttons.
      radioButtonText - the text of the radio button to select.

    • select

      String select(SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy)
      Selects a radio button within the specified container using a custom Strategy.
      Parameters:
      container - the container holding the radio buttons.
      strategy - the selection strategy to determine which radio button to choose.
      Returns:
      a string representing the selected radio button text, if available.

    • select

      void select(String radioButtonText)
      Selects a radio button, identified by its text, without referencing a container.
      Parameters:
      radioButtonText - the text of the radio button to select.

    • select

      void select(org.openqa.selenium.By radioButtonLocator)
      Selects a radio button identified by a By locator.
      Parameters:
      radioButtonLocator - the locator identifying the radio button to select.

    • isEnabled

      boolean isEnabled(SmartWebElement container, String radioButtonText)
      Checks if the specified radio button is enabled within the given container.
      Parameters:
      container - the container holding the radio button.
      radioButtonText - the text of the radio button to check.
      Returns:
      true if the radio button is enabled, otherwise false.

    • isEnabled

      boolean isEnabled(String radioButtonText)
      Checks if the specified radio button, identified by text, is enabled without referencing a container.
      Parameters:
      radioButtonText - the text of the radio button to check.
      Returns:
      true if the radio button is enabled, otherwise false.

    • isEnabled

      boolean isEnabled(org.openqa.selenium.By radioButtonLocator)
      Checks if the radio button identified by a locator is enabled.
      Parameters:
      radioButtonLocator - the locator identifying the radio button to check.
      Returns:
      true if the radio button is enabled, otherwise false.

    • getSelected

      String getSelected(SmartWebElement container)
      Retrieves the text of the currently selected radio button within the given container.
      Parameters:
      container - the container holding the radio buttons.
      Returns:
      the text of the selected radio button, or an empty string if none is selected.

    • getSelected

      String getSelected(org.openqa.selenium.By containerLocator)
      Retrieves the text of the currently selected radio button within the container located by the given locator.
      Parameters:
      containerLocator - the locator identifying the container.
      Returns:
      the text of the selected radio button, or an empty string if none is selected.

    • getAll

      List<String> getAll(SmartWebElement container)
      Retrieves a list of all radio button texts within the given container.
      Parameters:
      container - the container holding the radio buttons.
      Returns:
      a list of all available radio button texts.
